overview: Los Angeles, 1990...  "I was just sitting here thinking about Barbara Dare, Erica Boyer, Tom Byron, Peter North - at the hot chicks and hard dudes I used to mess around with.  "And I guess I wasn't wearing anything. And I guess I started to touch myself. And well, maybe there was someone filming..."
tagline: Do You Think About Me Now And Then?
title: Ginger Then and Now
